title: Windows 11 build 22579 is out with BitLocker improvements
content:
Microsoft is a bit late this week, but there’s a brand new Windows 11 Insider Preview that’s available to test out in the Dev channel. Unlike what we’ve seen in previous weeks, there’s not a whole lot that’s new. There’s also no mention of tabs in the File Explorer, something that was hidden in last

The post Windows 11 build 22579 is out with BitLocker improvements appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft is releasing this week's Windows 11 Insider Preview build, and this week, there's not much that's new aside from BitLocker features.
